meta.title: Colombia Employer Cost Calculator
meta.description: Calculate the full monthly and annual employer cost for Colombian employees with real-time legal context.

hero.title: Understand the true cost of hiring in Colombia.
hero.subtitle: Model salary scenarios, see mandatory employer contributions, and share aligned figures with finance, HR, and leadership.

baseSalary.label: Base salary
baseSalary.helper: Enter the monthly base salary in COP.

arl.label: ARL risk class
arl.helper: Choose the occupational risk level for the role.

exoneration.label: Art. 114-1 Exoneration applies?
exoneration.helper: Employers under exoneration do not pay Salud, SENA, or ICBF if the base is under 10× SMMLV.

smmlv.label: SMMLV
smmlv.helper: Default 2025 value. Update if the decree changes.

integral.label: Use salario integral?
integral.helper: Integral salary bundles most benefits into a 30% factor prestacional.

results.title: Total employer cost
results.transportIncluded: Auxilio de transporte is included because the base salary is under 2× SMMLV.
results.transportExcluded: Auxilio de transporte is not included above 2× SMMLV.
results.exonerationApplied: Exoneration applies — Salud, SENA, and ICBF employer contributions are zero.
results.exonerationNotApplied: Exoneration does not apply — all employer contributions are due.

resetButton.label: Reset to SMMLV
resetButton.title: Reset salary to the current minimum wage

descriptions.accruals: Accrued benefits paid annually or semi-annually

validation.salary-positive: Salary must be greater than zero.
validation.smmlv-positive: SMMLV must be greater than zero.
validation.integral-positive: Integral salary must be greater than zero.
validation.integral-min: Integral salary must be at least 13 × SMMLV.

integral.note: When salario integral is enabled, prestaciones (prima, cesantías, intereses, vacaciones) are internalised in the salary. Only statutory contributions remain.

contributions.title: Contributions (paid monthly)
contributions.body: Employer social security includes Salud (8.5%), Pensión (12%), ARL (risk-based), Caja (4%), SENA (2%), and ICBF (3%). Exonerated firms skip Salud, SENA, and ICBF below 10× SMMLV.

accruals.title: Mandatory accruals
accruals.body: Prestaciones legales accrue monthly: Prima and Cesantías at 8.33% each over salary plus transport, Intereses a las cesantías at 1%, and Vacaciones at 4.17% of salary.

integral.title: Salario integral
integral.body: Integral salary combines base pay plus a 30% factor prestacional. It must be at least 13× SMMLV. Prestaciones are built in, but contributions (Pensión, ARL, Caja, Salud/SENA/ICBF when applicable) remain due.

footer.disclaimer: This tool provides an estimate based on statutory rates. Confirm final numbers with your payroll or tax advisor.
